channel.title: Bug Reporting
channel.description: If you've broken Eon, bring it here and we'll fix it.

item.title: [Beta0] Keybinder is empty
item.author: invalid@example.com (Switch`)
item.dc:creator: Switch`
item.content:encoded:
1. Close the game
2. Download this www.coronaleonis.com/eon/beta0/DefUser.zip file & extract it to your /UT2004/Eon/System/ dir overwriting the existing DefUser.ini file.
3. Delete the /UT2004/Eon/System/EonUser.ini file
4. Restart the game

item.title: Just some things I've noticed (in case you haven't)
item.author: invalid@example.com (Dave2600)
item.dc:creator: Dave2600
item.content:encoded:
You probably already know about all of these, but I'm just gonna go ahead and post em:





Your body looks normal when you have your gun down to your side,





But with your gun out in front of you it zooms all the way down to your knees






The ground comes...

Just some things I've noticed (in case you haven't)

item.title: Special EXCLSIVE PREVIEW BUG!
item.author: invalid@example.com (HyPer128)
item.dc:creator: HyPer128
item.content:encoded:
SOME SNEAK PEEK BUGS IN ACTION!.


Unofficial secret move, shooting gun with your brain from your back while climbing! When you climb, the bullets are switched out for MIND BULLETS!

item.title: Just some thoughts/feedback
item.author: invalid@example.com (iddQd)
item.dc:creator: iddQd
item.content:encoded:
Hi just wanted to drop over some words for you to read or not to read.

Now you probably have most of my feedback already in mind.

When you climb ladders and look straight down you can see the head, which youre suposed to se from not on.

The Gun needs some serious, fire annimation the gun points up and soo on... to make it feel more heavy and i would like if it was manually reloaded after each bullet, meaning youll have to pull some kind of switch.... also the fire sound needs to...

Just some thoughts/feedback

item.title: Momentums and going thru walls
item.author: invalid@example.com (GeneticFreak)
item.dc:creator: GeneticFreak
item.content:encoded:
Ookay, if I strafe right it will take a while to strafe left, and vice versa
And I find myself moving thru pillars and got stuck in walls. And sometimes I can fire my gun from inside the wall *grin*

Nothing really serious, just cosmetical I guess.

item.title: Bug Reporting
item.author: invalid@example.com (Samurai)
item.dc:creator: Samurai
item.content:encoded:
Welcome to the Eon Bug Reporting discussion forum.

If you find a bug, glitch, or inconsistency in Eon somewhere, post it here along with any relevant screenshots and information and we'll do our best to include a fix for the next release.

If you've broken Eon, bring it here and we'll fix it.
